onCellClick.description: Called when a cell is clicked.

onCellValueChanged.description: Called when a cell value is changed.

onRowClick.description: Called when a row is clicked.

onRowDragEnd.description: Called when a row is dragged to another position in the grid.

onRowSelected.description: Called when a row is selected.

onSelectionChanged.description: Called when the selected rows are changed.
